definition: the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
under one's own name/named after oneself

sentences.english: I consent to take any pre-employment physical examination required by the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本人願意接受公司要求的職前體格檢查。

sentences.english: A noblewoman holding the rank of viscount in her own right.
sentences.chinese: 本人擁有子爵權利的女子爵。

sentences.english: The letter is to be handed to him in person.
sentences.chinese: 這封信必須面交他本人。

sentences.english: Hideyoshi himself brought along two portable teahouses in starkly contrasting styles.
sentences.chinese: 豐臣秀吉本人帶來了兩個風格截然不同的便攜式茶館。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, we cannot send other Test Report forms to you directly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們不能將額外的成績單直接寄給您本人。

sentences.english: He requires to do eVery abundancething his own way.
sentences.chinese: 他任何事件都要按本人的辦法做。

sentences.english: Inarius took the guise of a human as The Prophet of the Cathedral of Light.
sentences.chinese: 印那瑞斯本人僞裝成一個人類，作爲光之大教堂先知。

sentences.english: When you're the guest, you should just make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 你若是客人，只需使本人感到自正在就好了。

sentences.english: We do not entertain buyer who do not pay in full!
sentences.chinese: 如果買主沒付全款，本人有權不出貨。

sentences.english: I am holding a licence to possess the concerned irradiating apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本人正持有牌照管有該輻照儀器。

sentences.english: The company to RenHui forever, I resolution people a break.
sentences.chinese: 仁惠把公司交給永民，本人決議休息一段時間。

sentences.english: I am currently pursuing a PhD degree in Bioinformatics at the UofM.
sentences.chinese: 本人現在正在攻讀生物信息學博士的學位。

sentences.english: Finally, MaXiao point to my pistol suddenly flip, pointing blade.
sentences.chinese: 終於，馬嘯指向本人的手槍忽然翻轉，指向刀鋒。

sentences.english: Have you ever tried to answer questions like these, either for yourself or for someone else?
sentences.chinese: 你曾否爲你本人或你的朋友，提出過類似的問題呢？

sentences.english: Is it possible fme to see the harbour in person today?
sentences.chinese: 我今天是否有可能見到港務局局長本人？

sentences.english: I take charge in the pre-research in wireless transmission and some related techniques of the system.
sentences.chinese: 本人負責系統中無線通信及相關部分的前期調研工作。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
